price: 104 Les flammes de l’Enfer leur lécheront les visages qui seront totalement crispés.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
